name: The Crimson Program
description:
A fast-paced, parkour, first-person shooter game where the character has supernatural abilities given to her by an entity. She must navigate through each level killing anyone who gets in her way, to free herself from the hellish bond between herself and the entity.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

Right Mouse Button - Use Blood Ability

Spacebar - Jump

Q - Cycle Blood Ability

E - Interact

R - Reload

Left Control - Slide

More Info:
